heading: HR01928
0: “RESOLUTION URGING THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES THRU THE COMMITTEE ON GOOD GOVERNMENT AND PUBLIC ACCOUNTABILITY TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY IN AID OF LEGISLATION INTO THE GROSS FINANCIAL AND OPERATIONAL MISMANAGEMENT, CORRUPTION, AS WELL AS THE PROLIFERATION OF FRAUD THROUGH THE CREATION OF GHOST MEMBERS IN PHILHEALTH”
status: Pending with the Committee on GOOD GOVERNMENT AND PUBLIC ACCOUNTABILITY since 2018-05-30
